keywords_explanation_array: "Hydrocarbon molecules containing one or more double or triple bonds.","A molecule with equal distribution of electrons among its atoms. ","A colorless, flammable gas, C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>4</sub>, used as an agent in the synthesis of organic compounds.","A form of isomerism in which molecules with the same molecular formula have bonded together in different orders.","A chemical compound having the same molecular formula as another but a different geometric configuration, as when atoms or groups of atoms are attached in different spatial arrangements on either side of a bond or a ring."
